issue.title: [CI][Packaging] homebrew-cpp fails due to glib-utils being merged with glib
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17681](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17681). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The nightly build for 
 \* [homebrew-cpp](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/8245158682?check_suite_focus=true)

failed with the following:
```java

 apache-arrow-glib:
  * Dependency 'glib-utils' was renamed; use new name 'glib'. 
```
It seems glib-utils was merge with glib formula here:

<https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/108307/files>
